name: Rogue Rocks (itch)
description:
This was a personal project I made during the summer of 2016 using the GameMaker engine.

I'm unlikely to return to it as I've moved on to Unity. Development complete I guess (except for the high score table). I hope you enjoy it.

The pitch? "Asteroids just like you remember from 1979".

Windows PC

Extract and run the .exe no install required.

W - Thrust.

A & D - Rotate.

S - Hyperjump.

[Space] - Fire.

A changelog is available at the download link.
